title: Kirishima-kun wa Taiga-kun no Dorei
original_name: 霧島くんはタイガくんの奴隷
sinopse: Kirishima has become a member of the gang lead by the strongest yankee in school, Taiga Yamada. Having admired Taiga since junior high, he is taken by surprise by a special request Kirishima makes of him and what ensues there after.
